title.en: For the Maṇi Reciter of Kham

text.en: Homage to the guru and Three Jewels!
text.en-trans: lama dang könchok sum la chaktsal lo

text.en: From now until I reach the essence of awakening,
text.en-trans: dak ni changchub nyingpor chi kyi bar

text.en: No matter where I may be reborn, in those places
text.en-trans: gang dang gangdu kyepa dé dang der

text.en: May I always follow the Great Compassionate One
And dedicate my body, speech and mind to virtue.
text.en-trans: go sum gewé chö la chöpar shok

text.en: Inspired by loving kindness and great compassion,
text.en-trans: jam dang nyingjé chenpö kün lang né

text.en: In order to lead all Mahākāruṇika's followers

text.en-trans: lamé changchub chok la göpé chir

text.en: May I carry out the Great Compassionate One's activity.
